title: The Replay System On New Client
body:
So we can instantly record games or a clip from a game, but we can't view them due to file type?
I cannot find any way to open and view a WeBM File anywhere. I downloaded multiple WeBM Players on the Internet and none of them work.

I would really like it if someone from Riot would please explain to me how I'm supposed to use the WeBM files that are saved on my computer from the Built-In Recording System on the New Client.
It acts as if it wants to open on Internet Explorer/Microsoft Edge, but it doesn't, so what do I do?

replies.body:
You should be able to view the highlight in *any* modern web browser, as well as in [VLC Media Player](http://www.videolan.org/vlc/). It doesn't look like Internet Explorer works, so I'd recommend Chrome or Opera if you'd like to play it in your browser.

Let me know if you have any questions.
